title: Cannot install mysql
body:
I'm trying to create a spack package to install mysql but I'm having some problems to do it correctly. My `package.py` is this:

```
from spack import *
import os

GenURL = os.environ['GenURL']

class Mysql(Package):
    """The MySQL software delivers a very fast, multi-threaded, multi-user, 
       and robust SQL (Structured Query Language) database server."""

    homepage = "http://dev.mysql.com/"
    url      = GenURL+"/mysql-5.7.11.tar.gz"
    list_url = GenURL

    version('5.7.11', 'f84d945a40ed876d10f8d5a7f4ccba32')
    version('5.5.30', 'de881c1940aa05e78266e77c9ac3d129')
    version('5.5.27', '070340bc98dcb7f646287c97f1b91a1e')
    version('5.5.19', 'a78cf450974e9202bd43674860349b5a')
    version('5.5.18', '38b65815249f3bcacf3b0ee85171c486')

    depends_on('cmake', type='build')
    depends_on('libaio')

    def install(self, spec, prefix):
        build_directory = join_path(self.stage.path, 'spack-build')
        source_directory = self.stage.source_path

        cmake_args = [source_directory]

        if '+debug' in spec:
            cmake_args.append('-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=Debug')
        else:
            cmake_args.append('-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=Release')

        cmake_args.extend([
            '-DENABLE_DTRACE=0',
            '-DDOWNLOAD_BOOST=1',
            '-DWITH_BOOST='+build_directory+'/boost',
        ])

        cmake_args.extend(std_cmake_args)

        with working_dir(build_directory, create=True):
            cmake(*cmake_args)
            make()
            make('install')
```

I've tried to remove the last two `make`'s but it fails saying that there is nothing to install. The problem is that adding this two `make`'s I get many errors related to `yassl`. The error is in this line:

```
     84           cmake_args.extend(std_cmake_args)
     85   
     86           with working_dir(build_directory, create=True):
     87               cmake(*cmake_args)
  >> 88               make()
     89               make('install')
```

And this is the `spack-build.out` when it fails:

```
In file included from /my/path/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/openssl-1.0.2d-l7qbr5kqlqgcppenu7dabe2nydhf4gh6/include/openssl/x509.h:96:0,
                 from /my/path/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/openssl-1.0.2d-l7qbr5kqlqgcppenu7dabe2nydhf4gh6/include/openssl/ssl.h:156,
                 from /my/path/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.15-t42kasxcnimjmuwrnezff5pnp6c5niog/mysql-5.7.15/extra/yassl/src/ssl.cpp:32:
/my/path/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/openssl-1.0.2d-l7qbr5kqlqgcppenu7dabe2nydhf4gh6/include/openssl/rsa.h:181:18: error: expected identifier befor
e numeric constant
 # define RSA_F4  0x10001L
                  ^
/my/path/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.15-t42kasxcnimjmuwrnezff5pnp6c5niog/mysql-5.7.15/extra/yassl/include/openssl/rsa.h:26:8: note: in expansion of macro ‘RSA_F4’
 enum { RSA_F4 = 1 };
        ^
/my/path/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/openssl-1.0.2d-l7qbr5kqlqgcppenu7dabe2nydhf4gh6/include/openssl/rsa.h:181:18: error: expected ‘}’ before numer
ic constant
 # define RSA_F4  0x10001L
                  ^
/my/path/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.15-t42kasxcnimjmuwrnezff5pnp6c5niog/mysql-5.7.15/extra/yassl/include/openssl/rsa.h:26:8: note: in expansion of macro ‘RSA_F4’
 enum { RSA_F4 = 1 };
        ^
/my/path/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/openssl-1.0.2d-l7qbr5kqlqgcppenu7dabe2nydhf4gh6/include/openssl/rsa.h:181:18: error: expected unqualified-id b
efore numeric constant
 # define RSA_F4  0x10001L
                  ^
/my/path/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.15-t42kasxcnimjmuwrnezff5pnp6c5niog/mysql-5.7.15/extra/yassl/include/openssl/rsa.h:26:8: note: in expansion of macro ‘RSA_F4’
 enum { RSA_F4 = 1 };
        ^
In file included from /my/path/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.15-t42kasxcnimjmuwrnezff5pnp6c5niog/mysql-5.7.15/extra/yassl/include/openssl/ssl.h:34:0,
                 from /my/path/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.15-t42kasxcnimjmuwrnezff5pnp6c5niog/mysql-5.7.15/extra/yassl/include/cert_wrapper.hpp:37,
                 from /my/path/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.15-t42kasxcnimjmuwrnezff5pnp6c5niog/mysql-5.7.15/extra/yassl/include/yassl_int.hpp:31,
                 from /my/path/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.15-t42kasxcnimjmuwrnezff5pnp6c5niog/mysql-5.7.15/extra/yassl/src/ssl.cpp:34:
/my/path/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.15-t42kasxcnimjmuwrnezff5pnp6c5niog/mysql-5.7.15/extra/yassl/include/openssl/rsa.h:26:19: error: expected declaration before ‘}’ token
 enum { RSA_F4 = 1 };
                   ^
make[2]: *** [extra/yassl/CMakeFiles/yassl.dir/src/ssl.cpp.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
[  4%] Building C object strings/CMakeFiles/strings.dir/ctype-gb18030.c.o
[  4%] Building CXX object extra/yassl/taocrypt/CMakeFiles/taocrypt.dir/src/file.cpp.o
[  4%] Building C object regex/CMakeFiles/regex.dir/regerror.c.o
make[1]: *** [extra/yassl/CMakeFiles/yassl.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

I have updated the mysql version to 5.7.15 too but it keeps failing. I don't know what I'm doing wrong. Could anyone help me to solve it? Thanks
